attributes.action: Stop the Labour Government removing the right to elect trial by jury.
attributes.additional_details:
Despite being human rights zealots, David Lammy and Keir Starmer are politicising the courts with plans to remove the right to trial by a jury of our peers. This is the most important human right we have.

Without jury trials, defendants will be subject to a form of two tier justice that is akin to George Orwells 1984. It cannot be allowed.

This is the greatest attack on British democracy in history. It is anti-British and will also cost the taxpayer in legal challenges.
attributes.background: David Lammy and the Labour Government should desist from their plans to remove the rights of British citizens that have existed for over 800 years.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:
